name: Sil Bang
description:
--- Sil Bang ---

Tired of cleaning, our character changes dimension to fight green germs who sings all time

--- Controls ---
WASD - to move
Left Button - to shoot

--- Team ---

Umut Gürdal - Lead Developer
Ferhat Aybergüler- 2D Artist
Agah Canan - Level Designer
Yunus Han - Game Developer / Prop artist 
Yusuf Kızılkaya - Composer / Sound artist
Can Korkmaz - Game Designer
Hasan Kenger - Shader Developer
